name: BODHAMPTON
description:
WELCOME TO BODHAMPTON

The bloody little town of Bodhampton is in need of a someone to run things from the inside out. As the new mayor of this cellular village you'll need to manage your resources, whilst keeping an eye on natural disasters and keeping everybody safe.

HOW TO PLAY

Create builders and harvesters to revitalize Bodhampton!
Harvesters are capable of collecting resources from around town.
Builders are required to stand next to buildings to build and upgrade them.

Select plots of land using the left mouse button
Select units using box selection (click and drag)
Move units using the right mouse button




Grow your little town into a bustling city!

Build inside the comfort of your own body!
